TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ConfigurationErrorsException extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a configuration error has occurred.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception is thrown when any error occurs while configuration information is being read or written.
## Examples The following code example creates a custom section and generates a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception when it modifies its properties.
[!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/CS/ConfigurationErrorsException.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/VB/ConfigurationErrorsException.vb#1)]
The following example is a configuration excerpt used by the previous example.
```xml <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <configuration> <configSections> <section name="CustomSection" type="Samples.AspNet.CustomSection, ConfigurationErrorsException, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" allowDefinition="Everywhere" allowExeDefinition="MachineToApplication" restartOnExternalChanges="true" /> </configSections> <CustomSection fileName="default.txt" maxUsers="10" /> </configuration> ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property BareMessage As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ BareMessage { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.
Docs.value: A description of why this was thrown.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.BareMessage%2A> property does not contain the name of the configuration file or the line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception occurred. If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message, use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Message%2A> property.
## Examples The following code example shows how to get the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.BareMessage%2A> property value.
[!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/CS/ConfigurationErrorsException.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/VB/ConfigurationErrorsException.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Errors As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Errors { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of errors that detail the reasons this exception was thrown.
Docs.value: An object that contains errors that identify the reasons this exception was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Errors%2A> property collects as many errors as possible that might occur during an operation, such as reading a configuration file. The exception thrown shows only the first error. You can access <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Errors%2A> to see all the errors issued.

Docs.summary: Gets the path to the configuration file being read when this configuration exception was thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string GetFilename(class System.Xml.XmlNode node) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetFilename (node As XmlNode) As String

Docs.param: The object that caused this exception to be thrown.
Docs.summary: Gets the path to the configuration file from which the internal object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.
Docs.returns: The path to the configuration file from which the internal object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that contains the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object being parsed when the exception occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string GetFilename(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetFilename (reader As XmlReader) As String

Docs.param: The object that caused this exception to be thrown.
Docs.summary: Gets the path to the configuration file that the internal was reading when this configuration exception was thrown.
Docs.returns: The path of the configuration file the internal object was accessing when the exception occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.

Docs.summary: Gets the line number within the configuration file that was being processed when this configuration exception was thrown.

Public Shared Function GetLineNumber (node As XmlNode) As Integer

Docs.summary: Gets the line number within the configuration file that the internal object represented when this configuration exception was thrown.
Docs.returns: The line number within the configuration file that contains the object being parsed when this configuration exception was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that contains the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object being parsed when the exception occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 GetLineNumber(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetLineNumber (reader As XmlReader) As Integer

Docs.param: The object that caused this exception to be thrown.
Docs.summary: Gets the line number within the configuration file that the internal object was processing when this configuration exception was thrown.
Docs.returns: The line number within the configuration file that the object was accessing when the exception occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetLineNumber%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub GetObjectData (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

Docs.param: The object that holds the information to be serialized.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
Docs.summary: Sets the object with the file name and line number at which this configuration exception occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetObjectData%2A> method sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object with the file name and line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception occurred. During deserialization, the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object that is transmitted over the stream.
